pages.title: The Basics
pages.text: This is a bit more complicated. As mobs spawned in dark rooms are considered natural mob spawns, I need to use weird methods to punish farming those. I decided to punish based on how many mobs were killed that spawned in a certain chunk. The penalty quickly is lost as time passes.

pages.title: More info
pages.text: In normal minecraft gameplay, you kill a few mobs, then move a chunk or two. But while using a dark room farm, you usually kill mobs that spawned in the same place. This feature effectively penalizes that and makes it not worth it to farm like that.
